1098:826: na hi kaścit tathāgate sadevako'pi loko duṣṭacittamutpādayituṃ kṣamate|
1098:833: tathā ca sadevakasya lokasya arthaḥ upahato bhavet|
1098:837: yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamān stūpān vinipātayeddahedvā,
1098:838: yaścānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vyāpādakhilakrodhacittamutpādya ākrośayet paribhāṣayet,
1098:844: bodhisattvaṃ satkṛtya sarvabuddhāḥ satkṛtā bhavanti| ityādi||
1098:851: yasya punaḥ puṇyātmano manaḥ prasādamupayāti bodhisattve,
1098:853: tasya prasannacittasya prasavedupajāyeta tato'dhikaṃ phalaṃ tasmātpūrvakapāpaphalād bahutaraṃ puṇyakarmaphalaṃ vipākaviśeṣāt prasavedutpadyeta|
1098:858: sacenmañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā utpāṭitākṣā bhaveyuḥ parikalpamupādāya|
1098:859: atha kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittastānyakṣīṇi janayet parikalpamupādāya|
1098:860: yo'nyo vā mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prasannacittaḥ paśyet,
1098:864: yasmānmahatā balena paramakṛcchreṇa pāpakaṃ pāpameva pāpakaṃ kutsitatvādvā duṣkṛtaṃ karma bodhisattveṣu kriyate,
1098:868: tadyathā kulaputra cintāmaṇiratnarājamukuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
1098:870: ataḥ kimarthamanarthopārjanaṃ kaṭukaphalaṃ teṣu prayatnataḥ prārabhyate ?
1098:876: sāṃpratamutpāditabodhicitteṣu atiśayavatā ātmanā manaḥprasādamāviṣkurvan śāstrakārastān namasyannāha-
1098:881: teṣāṃ puruṣakuñjarāṇāṃ śarīrāṇi ātmabhāvān namaskaromi praṇipatya vande|
1098:890: yeṣu paramakalyāṇahṛdayeṣu bodhisattveṣu apakāro'pi parābhavo'pi kṛtaḥ tatkartuḥ sukhānubandhī paraṃparayā sukhamāvahatīti|
1098:892: saṃbhave vā kathaṃcit tadapakārameva nimittaṃ kṛtvā pravṛttānāṃ duṣṭābhiprāyāṇāṃ punaḥ kenacinnimittena tatprasādasamutpādanāt|
1098:897: abhyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye'pyapakāriṇaḥ|
1098:899: athavā| yatrāpakāro'pi yeṣāmapakāro'pi mahākaruṇādhyāśayāt priyaputreṇa kṛta iva duḥkhaheturapi sukhameva janayati,
1098:901: evaṃ sarvathā sukhahetutvāt sukhārthināṃ ratnākara iva ratnārthināmāśryaṇīyā bodhisattvā ityupadarśayati|
1098:906: te mama trāṇaṃ bhavantu iti bhāvaḥ||
